txt.en: 'Although I am saddened that my wife thought it wise to not tell me, I understand that my stubborness drove her to such a decision - one she made boldly. I am pleased that Folcred is now safe with my mother in Edoras. The time will come when he can return to the Sutcrofts, but until these lands are no longer under siege by the Orcs, he will remain there.'
What has happened to your son?
